name: BASICAL
description:
An amazing game of skill and luck! Mostly luck. Watch in amazement as your dropped chips bounce around scoring points. Spend your points on unbelievable upgrades or just watch those numbers grow higher and higher!!!

Now featuring Wormy and Ms. Wormy! Two cute little worms who squirm around the play field just waiting for you to kill them!

Features:
-Zeros
-Non-Zero numbers
-Little pegs or squares, whatever
-A few different colors
-Some sound effects
-Use bombs to advance rounds
-Holiday themed rounds for December and February
-etc.

Watch the Trailer: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X_K6FtibAY8
